name: Full Page Advertisement Design from $95.00
description:
This is a great way to get your newsprint advertising working more effectively for your business. Large ads (especially black & white ones) can make a big impact with a great design...make that expenditure work for you, have a punchy, relevant ad that looks appealing and communicates your message clearly.

“adapt design” calls on a decade of professional graphic design experience in the newspaper publication industry to offer a niche service to get your advertising working for you, for a minimal price.

As your finished ad will be emailed to you in a PDF format,
that makes SHIPPING TOTALLY FREE.

Graphic design service for box advertisement:
- Size up to 260mm x 360mm
- Unlimited text (constrained by what fits in this size)
- 5 x Company logo
- 10 x images
- Layout
- 3 x alterations with low res PDF proof
- 1 final hi res, press ready PDF proof

This product entitles the buyer to a brand new custom designed ad, or a rebuild/improved design of a current ad with initial, low resolution, watermarked PDF proof.

Three alterations will be included with a low resolution, watermarked PDF proof for each alteration made (this does not include corrections ie: errors made by me in spelling, colour use or very specific instructions only).

Once approved and payment recieved via Paypal, a print quality, high resolution PDF file will be supplied to you via email.

Once you have purchased this product you may use it for as much advertising as you wish in any number of publications!
(I do not claim copyright on ads purchased).

PLEASE NOTE...
* Ads must be ordered, with all information required for content supplied at least 48hrs prior to publications deadline to ensure the best results.

* Extra images, logos, alterations will be charged. (Check below for prices).

* Last minute ads (any ads required in 48hrs or less) can be created on agreement, but will incure a 'pressure' charge. (Check below for prices)
